name: Zib PulseRate
title: HCIM PulseRate
description: This profile is derived from the HL7 Vital Signs profile for pulse rate in order to add mappings from the Dutch Health and Care Information models (Dutch: Zorginformatiebouwsteen or ZIB) PulseRate, version 3.1 and to provide extensions for missing concepts.
purpose: The pulse rate is expressed in the number of tangible pulsations of an artery per minute, usually the a. radialis, a. carotis or a. femoralis.

mapping.name: HCIM PulseRate-v3.1(2017EN)
mapping.comment: Known issue: due to missing terminology, there's no component mapping for NL-CM:12.7.5 (https://bits.nictiz.nl/projects/ZIB/issues/ZIB-689)

element.definition:
This profile defines how to represent pulse rate observations in FHIR using a standard LOINC code and UCUM units of measure.
The element contains the value of the pulse rate measured. The pulse rate is expressed in the number of tangible pulsations of an artery per minute, usually the a. radialis, a. carotis or a. femoralis.
